Body:
setRoles(self.portal, TEST_USER_ID, ['Manager'])
view = BrowserView(self.issue, self.request)
manager_name = 'plone.abovecontentbody'
alsoProvides(self.request, IProductsEasyNewsletterLayer)
manager = queryMultiAdapter((self.issue, self.request, view),
    IViewletManager, manager_name, default=None)
self.assertIsNotNone(manager)
manager.update()
my_viewlets = [v for v in manager.viewlets if v.__name__ ==
    'newsletter-actions']
self.assertEqual(len(my_viewlets), 0)
